testInfo.name: B2 Upper-Intermediate Level Test
testInfo.description: Main ideas of complex text on both concrete and abstract topics

questions.question: Which sentence uses the correct form of "affect" and "effect"?
options: The weather will effect my plans.
The weather will affect my plans.
The weather will affects my plans.
The weather will effected my plans.
questions.correctAnswer: The weather will affect my plans.

questions.question: Fill in the blank: "If I ____ (know) the answer, I would tell you."
Which sentence uses the correct form of "their, there, they're"?
Fill in the blank: "She ____ (be) working here for five years next month."
Choose the correct form of the verb: "By the time she arrives, we ____ (finish) our homework."
What is the passive voice form of: "They will deliver the package tomorrow."?
questions.correctAnswer: The package will be delivered tomorrow.

questions.question: Which of these is a compound noun?
Fill in the blank: "He ____ (finish) the project by the end of this week."
What is the past participle of "to see"?
Choose the correct conjunction: "She is intelligent ____ hardworking."
Fill in the blank: "If he ____ (study) harder, he would have passed the exam."
Which word is a synonym for "begin"?
Fill in the blank: "She was ____ (choose) to represent the company at the conference."
Choose the correct relative pronoun: "The book ____ I borrowed from you is excellent."
Fill in the blank: "She ____ (complete) the report by the end of the day."
Which sentence is in the present perfect continuous tense?
options: I have been working here for five years.
I had been working here for five years.
I will have been working here for five years.
I am working here for five years.
questions.correctAnswer: I have been working here for five years.

questions.question: Fill in the blank: "They ____ (build) a new house by the end of the year."
